name: Sangokushi No Sekai Duo Treasure Box
synopsis: {{Collection| Japanese Editions of [[Dynasty Tactics 2]], [[Kessen II]], Sangokushi History Book 2003, Sangokushi special save data collection disc, 16 Dynasty Tactics 2 "capture" cards, Dynasty Warriors 4 playing cards deck, as well as 16 Dynasty Warriors 4 commander character cards. Note that included ''Kessen II'' disc is a standard edition (SLPM-65015).}}
